Posts.EditableText:
You could use the [url=http://quest5.net/wiki/GetInput:2i5iigyg]GetInput()[/url:2i5iigyg] function for the name and set a variable (probably "player_name) to the input of the player.

For the age, you could allow the player to select through a menu, or type a number. For that, you might want to add an if script checking whether it's an integer or not.

As for the gender, use the [url=http://quest5.net/wiki/Show_menu:2i5iigyg]show menu script command[/url:2i5iigyg] with a list of options.
